eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: A mysterious thief steals the sword in which Chongyue has sealed away the bestial Sui consciousness. Zuo Xuanliao orders a series of operations to capture the Feranmut followers, and Lin YÃ¼hsia runs into Waai Fu and Du Yaoye, who decide to join forces to find the true culprit.

attributes.content: Who goes there?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Stop right there.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Do you know where you are, and exactly what that sword you're holding is?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's a sword. The sword that I've been looking for.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: Let us set aside the question for the time being who it is you are working for and how you made your way in here.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hand over the sword. I'll take you to the Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: A fickle-minded, perfidious man like him does not deserve to keep this sword.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: Impudence!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Grandmaster has defended Yumen's peace for a hundred years. How dare you speak ill of him?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How pretentious. What do you even know? Out of my way!
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: I've arrested no small number of criminals, but you are the first one I've met to be so arrogant.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Solemn on the outside, but self-centered on the inside. I've met plenty of men like you!
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: I see I have no choice but to get you to comply forcefully, then.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Try it.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: It's over. You've lost.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: This isn't where we settle this.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: If you would leave, surely you would leave us with an explanation?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I want answers, but you have none to give me.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: You let her get away.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: With her injuries, she won't get far.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Wei, your old bones don't seem to be much use here.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: My sincerest gratitude, Lin.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You are master of the Chi Xiao, yet you need someone to come to your rescue when your mortal enemies come attacking?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I do not remember having made such an enemy.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: A feint!
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Hmph...!
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: You're injured. Where can you run?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You...?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Watch out, Grandmaster!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Grandmaster, what happened here?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: This is my fault.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The sword has been taken.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: General, the assassin could not be found within five miles of the inner city, and there are no signs of her receiving assistance from anyone.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: No one else was ambushed, and neither the inner city core nor the armory show signs of having been infiltrated.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: No signs, or has it been confirmed they have not been infiltrated?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: We... cannot say for sure at this moment...
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: How could someone infiltrate the Yumen barracks and roam free... even after facing our four masters here.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Extraordinary.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I was too careless.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Do you have any clues regarding the identity of our assassin, Lord Wei?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Over the years, I've come across many who wanted my life, but I am alive and well nonetheless.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: All of them have either given up on the idea or perished long ago.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I am not acquainted with our friend tonight.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Zuo Le, any discoveries on your end?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: It all happened too suddenly. I wasn't prepared, and I wasn't able to take the assassin in, as a result.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not asking why you were unable to capture the assassin. I'm asking you what you saw.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: It was a young female assassin who infiltrated us and took the sword. She was hurt when she made her escape. Aside from that... I'm afraid I don't have anything.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: A cup shatters, with the Lord Exorcist seizing all its fragments with his hand.
Even with the distinguished guest in attendance, at that moment, he finds himself unable to quell his anger, just as he wasn't able to control his shaking hand as he drew his bowstring earlier.
Now that it has come to this, talking about it will do us no good.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Send the order out. Seal the city gates immediately, and set up checkpoints between each district. Do not allow unnecessary travel between them.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: In addition, send the word to the entire city. At the Hour of Shen two days from now, Yumen will slow and adjust course. Have the masses make ready for this.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Zuo Le.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Sir!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Capture the assassin, locate the Grandmaster's sword, and find the Shanhaizhong hiding in the city. Do all three without failure.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: You have three days. My personal troops are yours to command.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Keep this secret, and do not disturb the people.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Where's Lin?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: He left as soon as the soldiers came.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Lin has no standing in the court, meaning he has no right to stand in attendance as you give your orders.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Is there anything I can assist with?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Seeing as the assassin is after your life, your safety should be the top priority.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Once this commotion calms, I will send a battalion to escort you back to Lungmen.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I ask you to stay indoors for the next few days.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: May I ask what you mean by that?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Exactly what I said.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yumen will take care of the rest.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Our foe this time is exceptionally skilled. Perhaps I should...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I ask you to stay in the barracks and ensure the Grand Tutor's and Lord Wei's safety.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: It is equally dangerous to allow the criminal to roam free in the city.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: This affair began because of the Feranmuts. Considering you are who you are, you should not get yourself involved.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: After all, the only ones who know your true identity are all here in the room.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The general's tone is hardly heavy, yet it fills the entire building with silence.
A sigh can be heard from one of its corners.
Very well...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Do you have any objections to this arrangement, Grand Tutor?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I trust your judgment, Lord Exorcist.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Execute these orders at once.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Grandmaster, are you alright?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I don't believe there's anyone alive who could do him harm.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It seems you really believe in me...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: From the sound of it, you have heard already.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Let us set aside the issue of the soldiers outside the city for the time being. The defense of Yumen was part of your responsibilities to begin with. Considering this arrangement, Zuo Xuanliao clearly doesn't trust you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Naturally, I understand and empathize with General Zuo's position.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Which is why I have a few things I need you to help me with, over the next few days.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: This is highly unusual, and the foe we are up against is especially treacherous. I hope you'll lend Zuo Le a helping hand.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Given how he is, he may not be very receptive to me meddling with his affairs.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: In that case, it would seem now is not the time for us to resolve the matter between us.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You need not say any more. I know the score.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: With how little I have to do the next few days, I am hoping you will help me finish writing the last few chapters of the Book of Kung Fu as quickly as possible.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It is my duty, as your student.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: If there is nothing else, Grandmaster, I will take my leave. Please get some rest soon.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The man sighs, perhaps at the sight of the empty sword mount on the wall or something else.
How many more will you drag into this game...?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Once a pure stream of water flows into a polluted lake, you can no longer scoop any clean water from it. Don't you understand that?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Even if you try to replace it, you will never find her in all the chaos.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Why torment yourself with all this?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The sound of the patrol's clanking armor can yet be heard from afar, with nothing but a deafening silence otherwise.
The night is deep. The clamorous night finally calms.
He lets out another long sigh.
Hmm?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: How very brave of you.
How could I have failed to realize that you were here as well?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Of course I am here too.
Are you going to stop me?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: A skilled Go player making no skillful moves in an entire game. Your actions are really a bit too radical.
Oh... Or maybe it's because... your time is limited.
If that's where we are going, you barely have any time left yourself.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Do you really think we can ignore everything just because that man sealed his self away in the sword?
I came here for the one. Why would I be concerned with only one-twelfth?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: I could ask you. What makes you think that you can become him?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: I won't become him. I am no one but myself.
He and I. We have a score to settle.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: That grudge is yours and yours only.
We are not enemies.
That's not for you to decide.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: At the very least, at this point in time, we both have more important things to accomplish.
We won't be a hinderance to each other.
Is that a truce you are seeking?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: It's in both our interests. You have no reason to refuse.
You really are nothing like your brothers and sisters.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: I hope you'll show me something more interesting the next time we meet.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Miss! I heard youâ
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: Keep it down.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: I thought I told you not to seek me out in broad daylight.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: It's good to see all of you in one piece...
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: Any progress on your end?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: The Yumen markets are open for the first time in years. There are too many wares and people flowing in and out. We have no leads yet.
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: If it's not so convenient for us to look into this, let's have somebody else do it.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: How many of the merchants at the markets here are locals, and how many are from Lungmen?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: How many of the people behind us have missing paperwork at the L.G.D. or are in hock to us? Sift through them, and find someone who'd have an easier time than we would. It's not that hard.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Daai Siu Ze, this... sounds like it could be against the rules.
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist?

attributes.content: Do as I say.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Two weeks ago...
Feranmut followers?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: You needn't know where the intel came from.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Out of all the enemies that Yan has faced in the past thousand years, no small number of them lurked in the shadows.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yumen may rely on Lungmen for its supplies, but you shouldn't be responsible for security within their borders.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Yumen is an impenetrable shield, but there are pests hiding behind that shield. They need to be exterminated by others.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I want to send you there to take care of this.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You can operate as a special L.G.D. commanding officer. On paper, you will be in charge of security while the two cities are connected, and you will have a certain level of support from me.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I need you to run a thorough investigation into the dangerous elements hiding among Yumen's citizenry and ensure its smooth sailing. Should the need arise, you may resort to the most extreme measures.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Why me?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Because you are Lin YÃ¼hsia. Because you can take care of this.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I want you to do in Yumen what the Rat King did in Lungmen all those years ago.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Chief Wei... You didn't discuss this with my father before you came to me, did you?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: YÃ¼hsia.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Dad? You didn't tell me you were coming.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: You accepted Wei Yenwu's mission. I came take a look.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: So you've heard.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Investigating smugglers, eh?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I didn't want to trouble you.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Look at you, going through all the trouble to hide this from me. It's Wei Yenwu who you should be troubling.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: You never considered turning this down?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Somebody has to maintain the peace here...
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu has many a capable character under his wing. Why must you of all people clean up his mess?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Never mind. I could figure out what kind of excuses Wei is making even if I had to think with my tail.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: You should know what's happened tonight.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: So that's why the soldiers locked the city gate.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: So much has happened in the span of a day. If this was really a coincidence, it would have to be a hell of a coincidence.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: The Chief of Lungmen finds himself the target of an assassination attempt, the Grandmaster has his sword taken, and an Imperial Astronomical Bureau Messenger was killed. Each of these would make the headlines on its own.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: And they all occurred within hours of each other. It's unimaginable what kind of forces are behind them.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: When Wei Yenwu came to you, did he explain how dangerous this was going to be?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: All I knew was this wasn't going to be a walk in the park.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Yumen is not Lungmen, and you are not me.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I know that well... I will deal with this carefully.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: The agents I brought with me from Lungmen are all masters in their fields and have all followed you for years.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Plus, I know the world of jianghu... I've seen enough.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: If you know what it is you are doing, then I won't keep rambling.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I just hope this will be resolved quickly without delaying your trip to Victoria.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: It's just a study trip. I don't have to go...
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: You've helped me and the L.G.D. take care of plenty of things the last few years... to the point you haven't been able to do what you truly wanted to do yourself.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I did all that of my own volition, and it was all for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: It's not your own choice if you haven't seen another path.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Sometimes I wonder if... perhaps, like Ch'en, you shouldâ
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Dad! Are you hurt?! I'll get a doctor!
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: It's been years since I've taxed my arms and legs so much. My bones are aching. Looks like taking walks in the park every day isn't quite enough exercise.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I'll take you back to the general's estate.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: No need for that either. I'll find an inn nearby to stay the night.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Even getting to meet my old friends once is once aplenty, and I can't stand the atmosphere in that house tonight.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: My, what a coincidence.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I heard a commotion at the edge of the city earlier in the evening, and I figured something big must've happened. And now that I find you here, Mr. Lin, I'm sure something big must've happened.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So what you are saying is, an old rat like me might as well be a plague?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Of course not. I was only joking.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: YÃ¼hsia, let me have a few words with Mr. Lee in private.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Please excuse me.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: From the looks of it, your search in Yumen hasn't been too successful?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Don't get me started. The man has been gone for well over a decade, I was never banking on finding him within a month.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But it doesn't matter how long it takes. We still have to look for him.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You are a carefree man. It's only when it concerns this old friend of yours that you burden yourself so much.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Maybe I owe him from a past life...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Since you aren't in a hurry, may I hire Lee's Detective Agency for a job?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: How could I refuse a job from Mr. Lin himself?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That gets me thinking though. Haven't I been taking on a few too many troublesome jobs lately?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It goes to show what a capable man you are. We'll say I owe you one, if you do this for me.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Well, with such a generous offer on the table, looks like I really have to think this over and see if I can manage it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Heh, only a crafty fellow like you could manage this.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: One, two... nine, ten...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Urgh... All the names above me on the rankings look pretty tough...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Okay... Calm down... Just do your best...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Why can't I leave the city? Two of my brothers just died out there...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The gate is closed. Please leave.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, be reasonable, can't youâ
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Whoa, the Forte hunk with the golden mace got kicked right out of the arena.
attributes.name: Yumen Passerby

attributes.content: That Feline girl has won five straight matches now!
attributes.name: Yumen Passerby

attributes.content: Phewâ
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hey. Ni hao. I watched all your matches today.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You've got amazing kung fu. Want to come work for me and my escort association?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Escort association?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Not interested.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Don't be so quick to refuse. With your skills, I can give you a more than decent wage!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I'm not planning on making a living with my fists. I have a degree in mechanical engineering, I'll have you know.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Mechanical what...?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Never mind that! That just means you're something of a scientist, right? Yeah, science! The escort association I'm talking about is a new kind of logistics company. Science graduates like you have a bright future with us.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Hey, don't just walk away. I'm serious.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: So, that just happened...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It sounds you're going to have to wait till the lockdown is over before you can take your friends' belongings and news of their deaths back home to Shangshu.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm the one who brought them here. No matter how, I will bring them home.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Before I came to Yumen, I ran into Mr. Zheng in Shangshu by chance.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: He told me that when the day comes that no one needs kung fu to protect themselves, that's when we will finally have true peace.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Dad is right about that, but for now, I'm more fond of another saying. An eye for an eye.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I will find the one who did this.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: What are you two doing here?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: YÃ¼hsia?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The government official lady from earlier?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I thought you said you'd get to the bottom of this? How are you going to get to the bottom of anything now that we're on lockdown?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You two know each other?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: There's been a turn of events. Things are apparently trickier than I thought.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Then let me investigate with you!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I-I can help out, too...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's too dangerous. I can't drag outsidersâ
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: W-What's that sound?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Drums from the outer city district?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Look! The beacons are lit on the city walls.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's the Wangfeng Festival, one of Yumen's traditions. It's a ceremony held every year at the beginning of spring, and it lasts three days.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: The drums at the barracks are beaten for the citizens' benefit. Each beat tells them the city, the lands, and all Great Yan are safe.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: As for the signal fires on the city walls, they are lit to guide the soldiers who gave their lives on the battlefield home.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Home...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Catastrophes sweep across the country, barbarians terrorize the borderlands, and bandits stir up trouble...
The drums are beaten seventeen times, representing the trials and tribulations that befell Yumen the past year, both big and small.
This border city has crossed the country's northern regions for centuries, and its citizens are hardened by these disasters.
The great wind cannot extinguish the flames in the meadow, the men's eyes fix upon their homes through the night.
